si.title: අවසන් මැතිවරණ ප්රති results ල කොළඹ දිස්ත්රික්කයේ

en.title: Final election results in Colombo district

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the final election results in Colombo district in 200 characters:
Colombo district election results: [Candidate names] secured [number] seats out of [total number]. Turnout was [percentage]. Key issues included [brief mention of major topics].
